articles.title: White Whale Memecoin Surges Past $100 Million Valuation
Bitcoin bulls chase $91K as early 2026 rally finds sustained volume
articles.description: Bitcoin bulls are making a run on $91,000 as start-of-the-year trading volumes highlight the market’s expectation of a positive Q1.

articles.title: Scientists Crammed a Computer Into a Robot the Size of a Grain of Salt
articles.description: Researchers built autonomous robots the size of salt grains—with onboard computers, sensors, and motors that think and swim independently for months.

articles.title: Truebit token price falls 99% after reports of $26M exploit
articles.description: The TRU price fell to $0.0000000029 from $0.16  after the protocol reported a security incident and crypto sleuths tracked stolen Ether.

articles.title: Temple Digital Group launches 24/7 institutional trading built on Canton
articles.description: The platform offers a private, non-custodial venue for regulated institutions to trade cryptocurrencies and stablecoins.

articles.title: New York Lawmakers Target Prediction Markets as NHL's Rangers Ink Polymarket Deal
articles.description: A New York assemblyman reintroduced a bill that would restrict prediction markets, barring bets on individual sports matches, war, and more.

articles.title: Bank of America upgrades Coinbase to 'buy' as exchange moves beyond crypto
articles.description: Bank of America said it recommended investors buy Coinbase's stock, pointing to its new products including weekday equities trading and prediction markets.

articles.title: Morgan Stanley to launch digital asset wallet as part of crypto product expansion
articles.description: The wallet, expected to launch this year, will support cryptocurrencies and RWAs as the financial services company adds to its suite of crypto investment products.

articles.title: ‘Deeply undervalued’ bitcoin faces continued bear market with no clear upside catalyst
articles.description: Experts say the next major rally may come only when long-term holders are exhausted, and true institutional capital enters the market.

articles.title: Crypto Market Cools as Bitcoin Stays Within Death Cross: Analysis
articles.description: The post-New Year rally fizzled fast. Bitcoin is back in death cross territory, and the charts aren't giving bulls much to celebrate.

articles.title: Ethereum scaling network Polygon close to buying bitcoin kiosk firm Coinme, sources say
articles.description: Polygon is paying $100 million to $125 million for the bitcoin ATM provider, according to one of the sources.
